column1: all over the country. Dr. Sadia Nadeem was invited on stage by Jazz to present the winning
students  a  cash  prize  of  Rs.250,000,  The  event  was  attended  by  Farah  Sheikh  (Head  of

Ali  (Head  of  HR  Business  Partnership)  from  Jazz.  Dr.  Waseem  Shahzad  (Director
Islamabad Campus), Dr. Sadia Nadeem (Dean Faculty of Management Sciences) and Adil
Kazi, (Director Centre of Executive Education) from FAST (Islamabad Campus) attended

L
ambda Bonanza event at Elixir Technologies
We want to extend our sincere gratitude and heartfelt congratulations to our students for
their exceptional participation in the recent Lambda Bonanza event at Elixir Technologies.
Nine  students  from  FAST  participated,  and  it  was  a  delight  to  witness  their  impressive

column2: Fakhar Abbas (Team Member, Al-Fajar Alpha, secured 3rd Place in competition)
